articles.title: Open Champion Cameron Smith says it's 'not fair' LIV golfers are not getting ranking points
articles.description: British Open champion Cameron Smith said on Wednesday he felt it was unfair that those who joined LIV Golf are not receiving world ranking points and hopes that changes before his exemption into golf's four majors expires.

articles.title: Candace Parker delivers another classic to lead Chicago Sky to series-evening win over Connecticut Sun

articles.title: Serena Williams works magic again at US Open, upsets No. 2 seed Anett Kontaveit in Round 2
articles.description: In front of another capacity crowd inside Arthur Ashe Stadium Wednesday night, Serena Williams mustered the same magic that pushed her to victory two days ago, upsetting No. 2 seed Anett Kontaveit 7-6 (4), 2-6, 6-2 in the second round.
